channel.title: Walk to object before doing action [508]
channel.description:
I would like to make a charatcer walk to an object after clicking it and do the action after walking.
I am trying to make the smithing interface popup when you click the furnace and after it walks to it.
Click on it, walk to it, open interface.
I know how to open the interface.
I working on a 508 btw. SkilledScape 508 base. Thanks.
